H0.text: What name is given to 2 distinct diseases, one of which is a condition due to deficiency of secretion of the pancreas, the other associated with diseases of the pituatary gland. Pituitaria

H1.text: What name is given to 2 distinct diseases, one of which is a condition due to deficiency of secretion of the pancreas, the other associated with diseases of the pituatary gland. Pancreatis

H2.text: What name is given to 2 distinct diseases, one of which is a condition due to deficiency of secretion of the pancreas, the other associated with diseases of the pituatary gland. Endocrina

H3.text: What name is given to 2 distinct diseases, one of which is a condition due to deficiency of secretion of the pancreas, the other associated with diseases of the pituatary gland. Diabedis

A4.text: Diabetes is due either to the pancreas not producing enough of the hormone insulin.

A5.text: Diabetes insipidus is an unrelated disease with symptoms that can mimic diabetes mellitus.
